# favorites

**Type Property**

Font collection of the user’s preferred font descriptors.

## Declaration

```swift
static let favorites: NSFontCollection.Name
```

## Type Properties

- **allFonts**: All fonts in the system.
- **user**: Per-user unmodifiable collection.
- **recentlyUsed**: Font collection automatically maintained by NSFontManager.

items.description: Font collection automatically maintained by NSFontManager.
items.name: recentlyUsed
